titleStmt.title: Englands reioycing at the prelats downfall, or, Gods goodnesse and mercy to England in delivering them from the cruell tyranny of blood-thirsty prelats
titleStmt.author: Ill willer to the Romish brood.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed in the yeare of the down-fall of the prelats,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Written by an ill willer to the Romish brood.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.

place.placeName: the yeare of the down-fall of the prelats
